text: Ara tara sampradayera netara, yara kuphari karechila o akheratera saksate mithyaropa karechila ebam yaderake amara diyechilama duniyara jibanera pracura bhoga-sambhara [1], tara balechila, â€˜e to tomadera'i mata ekajana manusa; tomara ya kha'o, se ta-i khaya ebam tomara ya pana kara se'o ta'i pana kare
